endpoints.description: Submit feedback regarding a specific home appliance's performance after purchase.
Retrieve a summary analysis of collected feedback for different product categories.
Retrieve a list of home appliances currently supported by the service.
Register a new product category or model to begin collecting feedback.
Retrieve detailed reports tailored for appliance manufacturers.
Report and mark specific feedback for moderation or review.
Retrieve analysis indicating trends in reliability data over time.
Retrieve insights related to specific regions or geographic areas.
Compare reliability feedback statistics between different products or models.
Request the removal of specific feedback entries, subject to service policies.
